messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

advice regarding the windows update sent monday action required cryptographic prevention hello there have lot today about prevention unclear what steps need take further laptop was during weekend performed restart morning need anything further heard colleagues performing some commands others manually disabling others manually installing patch can you please advise what should since patch should have already installed during weekend thank you senior software developer
